shapes3d.animation
Class AbstractVectorChangeAction

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.animation.AbstractVectorChangeAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShapeMover, ShapeRotator
public abstract class AbstractVectorChangeAction
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class that can be used to interpolate between 2 PVector objects over a given time. It is also possible to specify a delay time before the interpolation starts.
Inherit from the class to provide useful classes such as ShapeMover and shapeRotator.

Author:
Peter Lager
